page.title: 13Education
page.content: Children at{Woodsetts,Firbeck, {Letwell}and{Gildingwells}start play school in Woodsetts at 2 or 3 years old,then they go to {Nursery school}at 4.Then they go into the{Infants}on Gildingwells Road Woodsetts and leave at 7.They then move to the{Junior school}on Wellfield Crescent until they are 11.The Junior school is more modern than the Infants.At 11 they are taken by bus every day to{Dinnington {Comprehensive school.}Most leave school at 16 but some stay on in the sixth form to study for G.C.E. 'A'levels.When they leave at 18 they may go to University or Polytechnic.Children at{St Lukes {Junior school}in{Shireoaks}go to Portland High school at 11.
